trans-unit.source: Exposes the public members of the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> class to the unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 公開 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 類別的公用成員至 Unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This interface is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 此介面會從 unmanaged 程式碼會存取 managed 類別，而且不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This interface preserves the vtable order of the <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=nameWithType> class members that can be accessed by unmanaged COM objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面會保留 vtable 順序的<xref:System.Type?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別可由 unmanaged COM 物件存取的成員。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.Assembly" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.Assembly" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> instance that describes the assembly containing the current type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> 執行個體，描述包含目前類型的組件。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.Assembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> in which the type is declared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.Assembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>中宣告的型別。

trans-unit.source: For generic types, this property gets the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> in which the generic type is defined.
trans-unit.target: 為泛型類型，這個屬性會取得<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>中定義此泛型類型。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: The assembly-qualified name of the <see cref="T:System.Type" />, including the name of the assembly from which the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> was loaded.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的組件完整名稱，包含載入 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets the assembly-qualified name of the <xref:System.Type>, including the name of the assembly from which the <xref:System.Type> was loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得組件限定名稱<xref:System.Type>，包括組件名稱<xref:System.Type>已載入。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.Attributes" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.Attributes" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes" /> object representing the attribute set of the <see cref="T:System.Type" />, unless the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> represents a generic type parameter, in which case the value is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 代表 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes" /> 屬性集的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件；若 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 代表的是泛型類型參數，則這個值就是未指定的。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.Attributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets the attributes associated with the <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.Attributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得相關聯的屬性<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.BaseType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.BaseType" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> from which the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> directly inherits, or <see langword="null" /> if the current <see langword="Type" /> represents the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 目前直接繼承自 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；而當目前 <see langword="null" /> 代表的是 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 類別時，則為 <see langword="Type" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.BaseType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets the type from which the current <xref:System.Type> directly inherits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.BaseType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得型別從其目前<xref:System.Type>直接繼承。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.DeclaringType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.DeclaringType" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object for the class that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: 宣告這個成員之類別的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: If the type is a nested type, this property returns the enclosing type.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別是巢狀型別，這個屬性會傳回封入型別 (Enclosing Type)。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.DeclaringType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets the class that declares this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.DeclaringType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得宣告此成員的類別。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="Overload:System.Type.Equals" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="Overload:System.Type.Equals" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method determines if the underlying system type of the current <xref:System.Type> is the same as the underlying system type of the specified <xref:System.Object> or <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會判斷目前的基礎系統類型，是否<xref:System.Type>與指定的基礎系統類型相同<xref:System.Object>或<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> whose underlying system type is to be compared with the underlying system type of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，其基礎系統類型將與目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的基礎系統類型進行比較。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Type.Equals(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Type.Equals(System.Object)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the underlying system type of <paramref name="o" /> is the same as the underlying system type of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 的基礎系統型別與目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的基礎系統型別相同，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method determines if the underlying system type of the current <xref:System.Type> is the same as the underlying system type of the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會判斷目前的基礎系統類型，是否<xref:System.Type>與指定的基礎系統類型相同<xref:System.Object>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> whose underlying system type is to be compared with the underlying system type of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，其基礎系統類型將與目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的基礎系統類型進行比較。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Type.Equals(System.Type)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Type.Equals(System.Type)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the underlying system type of <paramref name="o" /> is the same as the underlying system type of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 的基礎系統型別與目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的基礎系統型別相同，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method determines if the underlying system type of the current <xref:System.Type> is the same as the underlying system type of the specified <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會判斷目前的基礎系統類型，是否<xref:System.Type>與指定的基礎系統類型相同<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeFilter" /> delegate that compares the interfaces against <c>filterCriteria</c>.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <c>filterCriteria</c> 比較介面的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.TypeFilter" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: The search criteria that determines whether an interface should be included in the returned array.
trans-unit.target: 判斷在傳回陣列中是否應包含介面的搜尋準則。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Type.FindInterfaces(System.Reflection.TypeFilter,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Type.FindInterfaces(System.Reflection.TypeFilter,System.Object)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects representing a filtered list of the interfaces implemented or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件的陣列，表示由目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 所實作或繼承之介面的篩選清單。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Type" />, if no interfaces matching the filter are implemented or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 類型的空陣列 (如果目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 沒有實作或繼承任何符合篩選條件的介面時)。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.FindInterfaces%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns an array of <xref:System.Type> objects representing a filtered list of interfaces implemented or inherited by the current <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.FindInterfaces%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法傳回的陣列<xref:System.Type>物件代表之介面的篩選的清單所實作或繼承目前<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="MemberTypes" /> object indicating the type of member to search for.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="MemberTypes" /> 物件，表示要搜尋的成員類型。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，由一或多個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 組成，而這些旗標會指定執行搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Zero, to return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 零，傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The delegate that does the comparisons, returning <see langword="true" /> if the member currently being inspected matches the <c>filterCriteria</c> and <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 執行比較的委派，如果目前進行檢查的成員符合 <c>filterCriteria</c>，則傳回 <see langword="true" />；否則傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <see langword="FilterAttribute" />, <see langword="FilterName" />, and <see langword="FilterNameIgnoreCase" /> delegates supplied by this class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個類別所提供的 <see langword="FilterAttribute" />、<see langword="FilterName" /> 和 <see langword="FilterNameIgnoreCase" /> 委派。

trans-unit.source: The first uses the fields of <see langword="FieldAttributes" />, <see langword="MethodAttributes" />, and <see langword="MethodImplAttributes" /> as search criteria, and the other two delegates use <see langword="String" /> objects as the search criteria.
trans-unit.target: 第一個委派使用 <see langword="FieldAttributes" />、<see langword="MethodAttributes" /> 和 <see langword="MethodImplAttributes" /> 的欄位做為搜尋準則，而其他兩個委派則使用 <see langword="String" /> 物件做為搜尋準則。

trans-unit.source: The search criteria that determines whether a member is returned in the array of <see langword="MemberInfo" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 判斷在 <see langword="MemberInfo" /> 物件的陣列中是否傳回成員的搜尋準則。

trans-unit.source: The fields of <see langword="FieldAttributes" />, <see langword="MethodAttributes" />, and <see langword="MethodImplAttributes" /> can be used in conjunction with the <see langword="FilterAttribute" /> delegate supplied by this class.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="FieldAttributes" />、<see langword="MethodAttributes" /> 和 <see langword="MethodImplAttributes" /> 的欄位可以與這個類別所提供的 <see langword="FilterAttribute" /> 委派結合使用。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Type.FindMembers(System.Reflection.MemberTypes,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.MemberFilter,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Type.FindMembers(System.Reflection.MemberTypes,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.MemberFilter,System.Object)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: A filtered array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects of the specified member type.
trans-unit.target: 指定之成員類型的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 物件篩選陣列。

trans-unit.source: -or-

An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" />, if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> does not have members of type <paramref name="memberType" /> that match the filter criteria.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 類型的空陣列，如果目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 沒有符合篩選條件的 <paramref name="memberType" /> 類型的成員。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.FindMembers%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a filtered array of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects of the specified member type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.FindMembers%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會傳回已篩選的陣列<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>指定的成員類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the fully qualified name of the <see cref="T:System.Type" />, including the namespace of the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> but not the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 含有 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 完整名稱的字串，包含 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的命名空間，但不含組件。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets the fully qualified name of the <xref:System.Type>, including the namespace of the <xref:System.Type> but not the assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得完整限定的名稱<xref:System.Type>，包括命名空間的<xref:System.Type>但不是組件。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Type.GetArrayRank" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Type.GetArrayRank" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> containing the number of dimensions in the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，包含目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 中的維度數目。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetArrayRank%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method gets the number of dimensions in an <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetArrayRank%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法取得中的維度數目<xref:System.Array>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="Overload:System.Type.GetConstructor" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="Overload:System.Type.GetConstructor" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method gets a specific constructor of the current <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會取得目前的特定建構函式<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects representing the number, order, and type of the parameters for the desired constructor.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件組成的陣列，表示所要建構函式參數的數目、順序和類型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An empty array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects, to get a constructor that takes no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件組成的空陣列，用來取得不需任何參數的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Such an empty array is provided by the <see langword="static" /> field <see cref="F:System.Type.EmptyTypes" />.
trans-unit.target: 這種供陣列是由 <see langword="static" /> 欄位 <see cref="F:System.Type.EmptyTypes" /> 提供的。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Type.GetConstructor(System.Type[])" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Type.GetConstructor(System.Type[])" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" /> object representing the public instance constructor whose parameters match the types in the parameter type array, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo" /> 物件，表示其參數符合參數類型陣列中之類型的公用執行個體建構函式 (如有找到)；否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method searches for a public instance constructor whose parameters match the types in the specified array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會搜尋其參數符合指定的陣列中之類型的公用執行個體建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，由一或多個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 組成，而這些旗標會指定執行搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Zero, to return <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.CallingConventions" /> object that specifies the set of rules to use regarding the order and layout of arguments, how the return value is passed, what registers are used for arguments, and how the stack is cleaned up.

trans-unit.target: 描述呼叫之內容的旗標。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method invokes a specific member of the current <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會叫用指定成員的目前<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the constructor, method, property, or field member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含要叫用的建構函式、方法、屬性或欄位成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An empty string ("") to invoke the default member.
trans-unit.target: 空字串 ("")，要叫用預設成員。

trans-unit.source: -or-
For IDispatch members, a string representing the DispID, for example "[DispID=3]".
trans-unit.target: 若為 IDispatch 成為，則為代表 DispID 的字串，例如 "[DispID=3]"。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，由一或多個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 組成，而這些旗標會指定執行搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: The access can be one of the <see langword="BindingFlags" /> such as <see langword="Public" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, <see langword="Private" />, <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="GetField" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 該存取可以是其中一個 <see langword="BindingFlags" />，例如 <see langword="Public" />、<see langword="NonPublic" />、<see langword="Private" />、<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="GetField" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: The type of lookup need not be specified.
trans-unit.target: 不需要指定查閱的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the type of lookup is omitted, <see langword="BindingFlags.Public" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Instance" /> will apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略查閱的類型，則會套用 <see langword="BindingFlags.Public" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Instance" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> object that defines a set of properties and enables binding, which can involve selection of an overloaded method, coercion of argument types, and invocation of a member through reflection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 物件，定義一組屬性並啟用繫結，可包含多載方法的選擇、引數類型的強制型轉，以及透過反映的成員引動過程。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" />, to use the <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />，則使用 <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> on which to invoke the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用指定成員的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the arguments to pass to the member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 包含引數的陣列，這些引數會傳遞給要叫用的成員。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[])" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[])" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the return value of the invoked member.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示叫用之成員的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method invokes the specified member, using the specified binding constraints and matching the specified argument list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會叫用指定的成員，使用指定的繫結條件約束並符合指定的引數清單。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the constructor, method, property, or field member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含要叫用的建構函式、方法、屬性或欄位成員的名稱。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An empty string ("") to invoke the default member.
trans-unit.target: 空字串 ("")，要叫用預設成員。

trans-unit.source: -or-
For IDispatch members, a string representing the DispID, for example "[DispID=3]".
trans-unit.target: 若為 IDispatch 成為，則為代表 DispID 的字串，例如 "[DispID=3]"。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，由一或多個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 組成，而這些旗標會指定執行搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: The access can be one of the <see langword="BindingFlags" /> such as <see langword="Public" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, <see langword="Private" />, <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="GetField" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 該存取可以是其中一個 <see langword="BindingFlags" />，例如 <see langword="Public" />、<see langword="NonPublic" />、<see langword="Private" />、<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="GetField" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: The type of lookup need not be specified.
trans-unit.target: 不需要指定查閱的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the type of lookup is omitted, <see langword="BindingFlags.Public" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Instance" /> will apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略查閱的類型，則會套用 <see langword="BindingFlags.Public" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Instance" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> object that defines a set of properties and enables binding, which can involve selection of an overloaded method, coercion of argument types, and invocation of a member through reflection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 物件，定義一組屬性並啟用繫結，可包含多載方法的選擇、引數類型的強制型轉，以及透過反映的成員引動過程。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" />, to use the <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />，則使用 <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> on which to invoke the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用指定成員的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the arguments to pass to the member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 包含引數的陣列，這些引數會傳遞給要叫用的成員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the globalization locale to use, which may be necessary for locale-specific conversions, such as converting a numeric String to a Double.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件，代表要使用的全球化地區設定，進行特定地區設定轉換時可能需要這個物件，例如將數值的 String 轉換成 Double。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to use the current thread's <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />，則使用目前執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the return value of the invoked member.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示叫用之成員的傳回值。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會叫用指定的成員，使用指定的繫結條件約束並符合指定的引數清單和文化特性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An empty string ("") to invoke the default member.
trans-unit.target: 空字串 ("")，要叫用預設成員。

trans-unit.source: -or-
For IDispatch members, a string representing the DispID, for example "[DispID=3]".
trans-unit.target: 若為 IDispatch 成為，則為代表 DispID 的字串，例如 "[DispID=3]"。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 位元遮罩，由一或多個 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 組成，而這些旗標會指定執行搜尋的方式。

trans-unit.source: The access can be one of the <see langword="BindingFlags" /> such as <see langword="Public" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, <see langword="Private" />, <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="GetField" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 該存取可以是其中一個 <see langword="BindingFlags" />，例如 <see langword="Public" />、<see langword="NonPublic" />、<see langword="Private" />、<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="GetField" /> 等等。

trans-unit.source: The type of lookup need not be specified.
trans-unit.target: 不需要指定查閱的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the type of lookup is omitted, <see langword="BindingFlags.Public" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Instance" /> will apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略查閱的類型，則會套用 <see langword="BindingFlags.Public" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Instance" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> object that defines a set of properties and enables binding, which can involve selection of an overloaded method, coercion of argument types, and invocation of a member through reflection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 物件，定義一組屬性並啟用繫結，可包含多載方法的選擇、引數類型的強制型轉，以及透過反映的成員引動過程。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" />, to use the <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />，則使用 <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> on which to invoke the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用指定成員的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the arguments to pass to the member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 包含引數的陣列，這些引數會傳遞給要叫用的成員。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier" /> objects representing the attributes associated with the corresponding element in the <c>args</c> array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier" /> 物件的陣列，表示在 <c>args</c> 陣列中與對應元素產生關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A parameter's associated attributes are stored in the member's signature.
trans-unit.target: 參數的關聯屬性儲存在成員的簽章中。

trans-unit.source: The default binder does not process this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 預設的繫結器不會處理這個參數。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the globalization locale to use, which may be necessary for locale-specific conversions, such as converting a numeric String to a Double.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件，代表要使用的全球化地區設定，進行特定地區設定轉換時可能需要這個物件，例如將數值的 String 轉換成 Double。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="null" /> to use the current thread's <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />，則使用目前執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the names of the parameters to which the values in the <c>args</c> array are passed.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，包含 <c>args</c> 陣列中的值所要傳遞之目標參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Type.InvokeMember(System.String,System.Reflection.BindingFlags,System.Reflection.Binder,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[],System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.String[])" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsAbstract" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsAbstract" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is abstract; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是抽象，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsAbstract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Type> is abstract and must be overridden.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsAbstract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Type>為抽象並且必須被覆寫。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsAnsiClass" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsAnsiClass" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the string format attribute <see langword="AnsiClass" /> is selected for the <see cref="T:System.Type" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="true" /> 選取字串格式屬性 <see langword="AnsiClass" />，則為 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsAnsiClass%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得值，指出是否字串格式屬性`AnsiClass`選取<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsArray" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsArray" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an array; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是陣列，則為 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsArray%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Type> is an array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsArray%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Type>是陣列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 與目前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 相比較的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Type.IsAssignableFrom(System.Type)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Type.IsAssignableFrom(System.Type)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="c" /> and the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> represent the same type, or if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is in the inheritance hierarchy of <paramref name="c" />, or if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an interface that <paramref name="c" /> implements, or if <paramref name="c" /> is a generic type parameter and the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> represents one of the constraints of <paramref name="c" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="c" /> 和目前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 表示相同類型，或者如果目前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 在 <paramref name="c" /> 的繼承階層架構當中，或者如果目前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是 <paramref name="c" /> 實作的介面，或者如果 <paramref name="c" /> 是泛型型別參數，而目前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 表示 <paramref name="c" /> 的條件約束之一，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if none of these conditions are the case, or if <paramref name="c" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果以上各項條件都不成立，或 <paramref name="c" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsContextful" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsContextful" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> can be hosted in a context; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在內容中可以裝載 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsContextful%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Type> can be hosted in a context.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsContextful%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Type>可以裝載在內容中。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Type" /> object to which the custom attributes are applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用自訂屬性的 <see langword="Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要搜尋這個成員的繼承鏈結以尋找屬性。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined(System.Type,System.Boolean)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if one or more instance of <paramref name="attributeType" /> is applied to this member; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果一或多個 <paramref name="attributeType" /> 的執行個體套用至這個成員，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method indicates whether one or more instance of `attributeType` is applied to this member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.IsDefined%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會指出是否有一個或多個執行個體`attributeType`套用至這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsEnum" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsEnum" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> represents an enumeration; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前 <see langword="true" /> 代表列舉，則為 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsEnum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets a value indicating whether the current <xref:System.Type> represents an enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsEnum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得值，指出是否目前<xref:System.Type>表示列舉類型。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsExplicitLayout" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsExplicitLayout" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the class layout attribute <see langword="ExplicitLayout" /> is selected for the <see cref="T:System.Type" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 選取類別配置屬性 <see langword="true" />，則為 <see langword="ExplicitLayout" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsExplicitLayout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets a value indicating whether the class layout attribute `ExplicitLayout` is selected for the <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsExplicitLayout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得值，指出是否類別配置屬性`ExplicitLayout`選取<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsImport" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsImport" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> has <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 有 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsImport%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Type> has <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute>, indicating that it was imported from a COM type library.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsImport%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Type>具有<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute>，它是否從 COM 類型程式庫匯入。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="M:System.Type.IsInstanceOfType(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="M:System.Type.IsInstanceOfType(System.Object)" /> 方法之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is in the inheritance hierarchy of the object represented by <paramref name="o" />, or if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an interface that <paramref name="o" /> supports.
trans-unit.target: 如果在目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 位於 <paramref name="o" /> 所代表之物件的階層架構中，或者目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 位於 <paramref name="o" /> 支援的介面中，則為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if neither of these conditions is the case, or if <paramref name="o" /> is <see langword="null" />, or if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an open generic type (that is, <see cref="P:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters" /> returns <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: 如果都不是這些情況，或者如果 <paramref name="o" /> 為 <see langword="null" />，又或者如果目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 為開放式泛型型別 (亦即 <see cref="P:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters" /> 會傳回 <see langword="true" />)，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsInstanceOfType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method determines whether the specified object is an instance of the current <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsInstanceOfType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法會判斷指定的物件是否為目前的執行個體<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: Provides COM objects with version-independent access to the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsInterface" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 為 COM 物件提供與版本無關的 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsInterface" /> 屬性之存取權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an interface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是介面，則為 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsInterface%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Type> is an interface; that is, not a class or a value type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsInterface%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Type>介面; 也就是說，不在類別或實值類型。

trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="c" /> 參數所表示的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 和目前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 皆表示類別，而且目前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 所表示的類別衍生自 <paramref name="c" /> 所表示的類別，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method also returns <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="c" /> and the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> represent the same class.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="c" /> 和目前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 皆表示相同的類別，這個方法也會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsSubclassOf%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method determines whether the class represented by the current <xref:System.Type> derives from the class represented by the specified <xref:System.Type>.
